basic-info.university: Federal University of Rio de Janeiro — UFRJ — Brazil

ta-graphs.title: Teaching Assistant in Algorithms and Graphs
ta-graphs.text: Besides having the opportunity to offer assistance to students in person as well as remotely, I've been contributing to the evaluation process of the course and orienting students on how to perform their practical assignments.

research-graphs.title: Undergraduate Research in Algorithms and Graphs
research-graphs.text: I've been part of two distinct theoretical projects involving complexity theory, distributed systems, concurrency in graphs and combinatorial optimization, resulting in a scientific paper submitted in November 2018.

research-big-data.title: Undergraduate Research in Big Data and Mach. Learning
research-big-data.text: Project in collaboration with the ATLAS Experiment (CERN, Switzerland). Our goal is to implement algorithms to identify similar data and diminish the training cycle of the neural networks in operation at ATLAS while preserving performance.

ta-algorithms.title: Teaching Assistant in Algorithms and Data Struct.
ta-algorithms.text: I had the pleasure to deliver lectures, elaborate exercises and propose practical assignments, besides assisting and getting to know the individualities of each student. It was my best experience in college.

first.title: Issues Monitoring
first.text: System built with Software Engineering techniques as a team to monitor activities of university labs at UFRJ. It features Arduinos, a web interface, a server and a parser for integration with a proprietary system.

second.title: AudioLooper++
second.text: Software built in C++ and Qt using the PortAudio library to record sounds and reproduce them in loop, one on top of the other, allowing for the creation of songs featuring multiple instruments.

third.title: Interactive Flowchart
third.text: Responsive flowchart that allows the user to set completed courses and see their requirements. It's easily adaptable to other programs of study by anyone uninitiated in programming.

second.title: 1000 Points in Writing section of ENEM 2014

third.title: 115/120 in TOEFL iBT (98th percentile)
